description:
Toriko and Komatsu are asked to track down the ingredients for a very special batch of candy, but the most unlikely of heroes ends up saving the day!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Gokujou no Chitose Ame! Komatsu to Yun no Monogatari!
Supreme Chitose Ame! Komatsu and Yun`s Tale!
極上の千歳飴! 小松とユンの物語
